info: Profiles allow you to work with multiple repositories. Only one profile is active at a time. When creating a new profile, the app will prepare the repository. Switching profiles will restart the app.
creatingProfileMessage: Creating profile and preparing repository... This may take a few moments.
profileNameHelper: A local folder will be automatically created based on this name

git.patHelperText: Your Personal Access Token is stored encrypted

s3.secretAccessKeyHelperText: Stored encrypted in the app's data directory.

local.info: Local repositories are stored on this device only and do not sync.
